result.arabic_text: مُهۡطِعِينَ مُقۡنِعِي رُءُوسِهِمۡ لَا يَرۡتَدُّ إِلَيۡهِمۡ طَرۡفُهُمۡۖ وَأَفۡـِٔدَتُهُمۡ هَوَآءٞ
result.translation: rushing forward with their heads raised up, eyes not blinking[31] and hearts void[32].
result.footnotes:
[31] This is their state at the time of resurrection from the graves.
 [32] Their terror-struck hearts are empty; perceiving nothing.
